comment: Collection that can only contain strings or scalars, which will be converted to strings
constructorsignature: Public Sub New(comparator As Comparator, mustBeUnique As Boolean, isSorted As Boolean)
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Collection that can only contain strings or scalars, which will be converted to strings&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Collection that can only contain strings or scalars, which will be converted to strings
inlinecomment: &apos; Collection that can only contain strings or scalars, which will be converted to strings
codesamplehtml: Dim coll as New StringCollection(Nothing False, False)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(&quot;Hello&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(&quot;World&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(1)         &apos; Will be added as &quot;1&quot;&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(True)   &apos; Will be added as &quot;True&quot;

methods.label: add
methods.comment: Overrides parent method, forcing to string if possible

methods.commenthtml: Overrides parent method, forcing to string if possible
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Overrides parent method, forcing to string if possible
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim coll as New StringCollection(Nothing False, False)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(&quot;Hello&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(&quot;World&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(1)         &apos; Will be added as &quot;1&quot;&lt;br /&gt;Call coll.add(True)   &apos; Will be added as &quot;True&quot;

methods.label: getNthElement
methods.codesample:
Dim coll as New StringCollection(Nothing False, False)
Dim retVal as String
Call coll.add(1)
retVal = coll.getNthElement(0)
